trends: There have been no other sightings in Okemos
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Saw 2 or more objects hovering less than half mile from my position. Looked like plates with a light on top.
divs: sighting detailsi walked outside at about 11:10 for a night smoke and saw some kind of blinking light in the distance to the west, about a half mile from me. at first i though maybe it was a plane taking off because there's an airport within 30 minutes of my house. but all of a sudden this light just stopped moving, almost instantaneous to when i started looking at it. it just hung in the sky, almost like it was watching me. i couldn't move my body or take my eyes off of it. i started to hear this beeping noise in my head, and it started to scare me. for some reason i looked in the rest of the night sky to see if there were any other craft, and i saw one more similar object to the north, farther up in the sky. how far i'm not sure. this one was also moving before i looked at it, i could tell for sure. but within a few seconds of my noticing the object it stopped moving as well. i got the same feeling as i had staring at the other one. i broke eye contact and went inside to get my phone to get a picture of the objects, but when i came back outside they were both gone. they both looked to be of a dinner plate shape, and they both had a red\blue pulsating light on the top (?). it scared me deeply to be back outside, and i had a feeling of dread for some reason. i'm not sure why. i'm typing this about 15 minutes after the sighting and i don't feel safe doing it.
